Game: Disney High School Musical- Livin' the Dream 2007 Help the Wildcats find the missing instruments in time for the state competition. Play as Gabriella, Troy, Sharpay and Ryan, each with unique abilities. Explore East High while solving the mystery to find the lost instruments.
